name: Alice.tech
headline: Alice.tech turns course materials into personalized exam prep using AI
description:
Alice turns generic course materials into personalized learning and exam prep using AI. 

Students simply upload what they want to study and instantly get access to:
(1) Better understanding: Key topic overviews and explanations with personalized support through an AI chat that knows their context.
(2) Effective practicing: Exercises tailored to their needs (level, format, curriculum, etc.), including flashcards, multiple-choice questions, and full exam simulations.
(3) Targeted improvement: Identification of weaknesses across topics to enable more targeted and complete learning.

Plus, learning becomes more engaging with Alice—students can study with friends and challenge each other, making the experience both fun and effective.

Over 2,000 students have already used Alice, and we are growing MRR +30% MoM for B2C alone, while gaining first traction in B2B on top.

founders.name: Patrick Gadd, CTO and co-founder
founders.description:
Patrick is the CTO and Co-founder of Alice.

Before Alice, he worked as Senior Data Scientist at LiveIntent (US AdTech firm), leading the internal MLOps framework, and invented a patented machine learning solution for audiences driving significant incremental revenue. He has worked with ML and software engineering his entire career.

MSc in Comp. Sci. from the University of Oxford. National and international finalist in the Geography and Physics Olympiads in high school.

founders.name: Kim Rants, CEO and co-founder
founders.description:
Kim is the CEO and Co-founder of Alice. 

Before Alice, Kim worked as an Associate Partner at McKinsey, where he specialized in AI. He was the fastest in Europe to make Engagement Manager. He also worked in LEGO as Head of Global Business Development. 

Kim has taught university students for 10+ years and holds two MSc. degrees: one in Finance and one in Computer Science, with specialization in AI.

# Overwhelm to overview
Alice gets it. So you get it.
“I often use Alice after my lectures to test myself on what was taught. I upload both the lecture slides and the corresponding syllabus texts, and Alice generates multiple choice questions for me. I find this extremely helpful for remembering the material, and I also love how Alice provides explanations for any incorrect answers I might have."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66683d47c7e547ed7d1c8c50/67447c741f4a78781f2910c2_qoute.svg)
Laura 
BSc in Business Administration and Psychology, CBS
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66683d47c7e547ed7d1c8c50/678adae1c4458d7431ad2a60_laura.avif)
“Alice helps me organize my course materials and gain a better understanding of the different topics covered in class. Plus, Alice is the perfect study buddy, instantly generating flashcards and practice materials, which is super time-efficient and has simplified my study process.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66683d47c7e547ed7d1c8c50/67447c741f4a78781f2910c2_qoute.svg)
Manice
MSc in Economics and Business Administration, CBS
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66683d47c7e547ed7d1c8c50/678adae20dc55ad1b6474858_manice.avif)
“I’ve always been super nervous before exams. Even though I do my best to study and get an overview of the syllabus, I always feel like there are parts I don’t fully understand. That’s where I think Alice is brilliant – through different exercises, I get tested on the material, and Alice quickly shows me where I’m strong and where I could use a little extra time.”

# Who the FAQ is Alice?
### Why should I choose Alice?
At Alice we’re all about simplifying your study experience, saving you time, and boosting your exam confidence. Imagine having everything you need for studying - all in one place. No more hopping between different tools and apps. We handle the nitty-gritty, turning your course material into personalized notes, summaries, and exercises with instant feedback.And yes, you get all the perks of the latest OpenAI model - just like ChatGPT and other top AI tools, but without the hassle of juggling (and paying for) multiple platforms.
### Does Alice work in my language?
Most likely, yes! Our AI model currently supports 10 languages, including English, Danish, German, Dutch, Norwegian, French, Spanish, Polish, and Portuguese. And we’re always on the lookout to add more - only when we’re confident the quality is top-notch.
### Can Alice improve my grades?
Alice can enhance your grades by simplifying your study routine into one easy-to-use platform. Our AI tailors notes, summaries, and exercises to fit your personal learning style and offers instant feedback to help you address areas where you need improvement.Research shows that active learning improves outcomes, and with Alice, you'll experience a more engaging and effective study process that leads to better academic results.
### Can I cancel anytime?
Of course! You can cancel anytime, no strings attached. Plus, you'll retain access to your subscription until the end of your current billing period, whether it's monthly or yearly.
### Is Alice legal and how do you protect my data?
Everything we do on our platform follows guidance from a law firm with expertise in this space. Some concrete measures we take are to i) never train on the input material, and ii) we never store the input material on our server, and iii) we never share input material between students.

# Who the FAQ is Alice?
### Why should I choose Alice?
At Alice we’re all about simplifying your study experience, saving you time, and boosting your exam confidence. Imagine having everything you need for studying - all in one place. No more hopping between different tools and apps. We handle the nitty-gritty, turning your course material into personalized notes, summaries, and exercises with instant feedback.And yes, you get all the perks of the latest OpenAI model - just like ChatGPT and other top AI tools, but without the hassle of juggling (and paying for) multiple platforms.
### Does Alice work in my language?
Most likely, yes! Our AI model currently supports 10 languages, including English, Danish, German, Dutch, Norwegian, French, Spanish, Polish, and Portuguese. And we’re always on the lookout to add more - only when we’re confident the quality is top-notch.
### Can Alice improve my grades?
Alice can enhance your grades by simplifying your study routine into one easy-to-use platform. Our AI tailors notes, summaries, and exercises to fit your personal learning style and offers instant feedback to help you address areas where you need improvement.Research shows that active learning improves outcomes, and with Alice, you'll experience a more engaging and effective study process that leads to better academic results.
### Can I cancel anytime?
Of course! You can cancel anytime, no strings attached. Plus, you'll retain access to your subscription until the end of your current billing period, whether it's monthly or yearly.
### Is Alice legal and how do you protect my data?
Everything we do on our platform follows guidance from a law firm with expertise in this space. Some concrete measures we take are to i) never train on the input material, and ii) we never store the input material on our server, and iii) we never share input material between students.

generated_description:
**Alice.tech: Revolutionizing Exam Preparation with AI**

Founded in 2024 and hailing from Copenhagen, Denmark, Alice.tech is a promising startup that’s quickly making a name for itself in the ed-tech space. It’s part of Y Combinator Batch W25, and its mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to transform generic course materials into personalized exam preparation tools using cutting-edge artificial intelligence.

### The Product

Alice.tech offers a simple yet powerful solution. Students can upload their study materials and receive immediate, tailored support that covers three main pillars:

1. **Better Understanding**: The platform provides clear overviews and explanations for key topics, supplemented by an AI chat that understands the student’s specific context.
  
2. **Effective Practicing**: Alice creates custom exercises based on the student's needs—think flashcards, multiple-choice questions, and full exam simulations crafted to suit individual learning styles and curricular requirements.

3. **Targeted Improvement**: The platform identifies areas where the student struggles, helping them focus their efforts more efficiently and effectively.

But it’s more than just a study tool; Alice allows students to engage socially by studying with friends and competing in challenges, making learning not just productive but also enjoyable.

### Traction and Growth

Alice.tech has already attracted over 2,000 students, an impressive feat for a new company, and it boasts a monthly revenue growth rate (MRR) of 30% in its B2C segment, with emerging interest in B2B. 

### Team and Leadership

With a lean team of six, the company benefits from the mentorship of Tom Blomfield as their Group Partner, which lends a competitive edge to their strategy and growth.

### Why Alice.tech Stands Out

The ability to support multiple languages (currently ten) sets Alice apart, catering to a diverse student population. The platform also prides itself on fostering a more engaging study experience that doesn’t just promise better grades but delivers active, interactive learning.

In terms of accessibility, Alice offers various pricing plans, including a free "Hustler Plan" that provides basic functionality alongside more comprehensive paid tiers.

### User Experience and Reviews

Student testimonials are positive, highlighting the efficiency of the tool in simplifying study processes and enhancing exam readiness. From generating practice questions post-lecture to providing instant feedback on performance, users find Alice.tech to be an invaluable study companion.

### Conclusion

Alice.tech is not just another education tool; it’s a responsive, intelligent platform designed to redefine the way students prepare for exams. With its growing user base and expanding features, it's a prime example of how AI can improve personal learning experiences. If you're a student looking to streamline your study process and boost your exam confidence, Alice might just be the AI study buddy you've been waiting for.

For more information, check out their website at [alice.tech](https://www.alice.tech/).
